name: @fishan/cdiff
description: A robust library for creating, applying, and inverting compact, single-coordinate diff patches. Features advanced options including char-level operations, patch compression, and configurable safety levels ('unsafe' mode).
author: Aleks Fishan a.fishan@gmail.com

scripts.build:minify: terser dist/src/cdiff.js -o dist/cdiff.min.js --compress --mangle && terser dist/src/cdiff_chars.js -o dist/cdiff_chars.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:prod:cdiff: terser dist/src/cdiff.js -o dist/cdiff.min.js --compress --mangle && terser dist/src/cdiff_chars.js -o dist/cdiff_chars.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:prod:cdiff
scripts.test:prod: npm run build && npm run test:prod:swap && mocha --bail --ignore "test/*.ts" "dist/test/*.js" && npm run test:prod:restore
scripts.benchmark: npm run build  && node --loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings benchmarks/index.ts
scripts.benchmark:myers: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings benchmarks/myers_benchmark.ts
scripts.benchmark:tuner: npm run build  && node --loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings benchmarks/tuner.ts
